text: The Battle of Gomit (another name: battle of Ygubbahttp://www.kruk.ayz.pl/cesarstwo/Historia1.html (Polish)) was fought in 1445 between Ethiopia and a powerful Somali army under the Adal Sultanate. The Ethiopians were led by Zara Yaqob, while the forces of Adal were led by Sultan Badlay ibn Sa'ad ad-Din of Adal. The Ethiopian army was victorious, and Badlay was killed. ==References== Category:Battles involving Ethiopia Category:15th century in Ethiopia Category:Battles of the Middle Ages Category:Conflicts in 1445 Category:Battles involving the Adal Sultanate Category:Battles of the Abyssinian–Adal war
title: Battle of Gomit
